#summary SteamProfile Overview

= Installation and Usage =

Extract archive to desired folder on your webserver. The directory _xmlproxy/xml/_ is used for caching, therefore it must be read- and writable for the web server process.

You can change configurations for the XML proxy in _xmlproxy/config.php_. For client configuration and template editing, open _steamprofile.xml_.

See example.html for examples and instructions for proper embedding into your website.

= Requirements =

== Server Requirements ==

 * A PHP-compliant webserver (tested with Apache/2.2.11)
 * PHP 5.0.0 or higher (tested with PHP/5.2.6-3ubuntu4.2) with cURL support

== Client Requirements ==

 * Any modern browser (tested with Firefox 3.5 and Internet Explorer 8)
